pages.text: $(li)The Nautilus Shell is hard material that can be used to craft Coralstone and Conduits.$(br)$(li)Drowneds rarely drop them on death and they can rarely obtained during Fishing too.$(br)$(li)Wandering Traders may sell them by Emeralds.
$(li)Finally, you can obtain it Smelting an Embedded Ammonite in a Furnace or Blast furnace too.
